summary: REQ-8 appears implemented by swapping CoinGecko market fetch to CoinCap with 50 assets, 5s refresh, EUR conversion, and preserved CryptoAsset shape with descriptive non-2xx errors. REQ-9 is mostly implemented via a persisted theme hook and a header toggle that toggles the document root `dark` class, but the toggle lacks explicit visible English text labels (only an aria-label).

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure all user-facing labels for the dark mode toggle are in English (e.g., "Dark mode", "Light mode").
missing_requirements.reason: The toggle control is icon-only and does not render visible English text such as "Dark mode"/"Light mode"; it only provides an `aria-label`.

hallucinated_features.description: Added new footer content/branding link and decorative heart emoji.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-8/REQ-9; introduces additional user-facing UI content unrelated to API swap or dark mode toggle.

hallucinated_features.description: Added backend health status console logging and warning side-effects in App component.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-8/REQ-9; unrelated behavioral change (extra logging/effects).
